overview:
Tullio Siragusa is a social media expert and has developed real time process and work flow optimization solutions for sales, marketing and operations.

Tullio Siragusa is a visionary leader who has impacted over $2.9 Billion Dollars in revenues, a 20 years veteran of Media (Search, Publishing, Web/Mobile and Social Networks), Software (Products and Services), Consulting (IT, M&A, Professional Services), and Telecommunication (Data and Voice) industries.

Tullio Siragusa’s past advisory clients include: News International, Viacom, Disney, NBC Universal, Microsoft MSN, Facebook, JP Morgan Chase, Citigroup, Bank of America, Dow Jones, Zurich Financial, McKinsey & Co, and GE. Advisory provided to the executive suite, and divisional management level.

Tullio Siragusa’s background includes: Co-Founder, Director and recent CEO of M3 Mobile Ltd - UK, a self publishing social media platform on web and mobile for entrepreneurs; CEO of SEM/SEO expert Ansearch Ltd. (publicly traded on ASX); Senior Global Vice President of Operative Media (Edison Venture Fund); and Director and Partner roles with Softtek / Ernst & Young, Computer Sciences Corporation and PricewaterhouseCoopers.
